items.text: full on middle, Williamson stretches forward and pushes it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: length on middle, Williamson opens up and pushes it past the diving midwicket and down to long-on for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 1 run

items.preText:
Sai: "Shakib has been the best all rounder of the tournament so far. Has done great every time with both bat and ball. Crucial player for Bangladesh for bigger strides this worldcup."

Rokib: "Guys pls don't get harsh on Mushi. It's part of a game. We won't get the best performance from him if keeping taken away. And other keepers can't bat as well as him."
items.text: full on middle, pushed to long-on for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, it's overpitched, a rare loose one from Shakib, he goes through the covers and beats both short cover and the deep fielder to his right
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: pulls his length back, on off, pushed back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: that's even shorter and has a bit of width, Taylor generally cuts well, this time plays it late and behind point for three
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, 3 runs

items.text: tossed up on middle, pushed to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, Taylor goes for the slog sweep, doesn't time it perfectly but well enough for a couple between deep midwicket and deep square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, 2 runs

items.preText: Imam: "@Rokib, you do remember he dropped QDK last game? And he has been doing this for 13 years? AND we have two more keepers in the squad and both are better than him and one is in the XI? And also, how childishly insistant he is to continue keeping? "
items.text: length, angled across, Williamson punched off the backfoot for one through the covers
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: length on the pads, tucked away to deep square leg for one
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, Williamson leans into the drive but finds cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: another one full and wide, Williams square drives but finds the deep fielder
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: length on off, Taylor defends to the off side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: length outside off, waits for it and runs it down to third-man for one
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, cuts it away to the right of point, the fielder from deep cover makes good ground to his left and puts in a timely dive but ends up pushing the ball back on to his right hand as he made contact with the boundary
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: length, angled across, flat delivery, looks to late cut again but misses
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: full and angled across, Taylor picks out cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: full and angled across again, Taylor shapes to go leg side, gets a slight leading edge, all; along the ground to long-off
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, Williamson stretches forward and defends
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Williamson, no run

items.text: shortens his length and angles it across, Williamson looks for the late cut but finds short third-man
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Williamson, no run

items.text: full outside off, shapes away from Taylor as he goes for the booming cover drive, beats his outside edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: length, angled in, drops it near his feet and they come through for a quick single, with the calling a lot more assured now
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, Williamson guides it to point with his bat almost hidden behind his pad, that's how late he played that
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: full outside off, Williamson pushes it straight to point, the crowd thinks it's a catch but he hit that hard into the surface
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: short outside off, rides the bounce nicely and steers to point, who does well to keep on strike with a dive to his left
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run
